subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Nick Saban is thought of as one of the N.F.L.’s brightest coaches, a defensive mastermind and a strong talent evaluator. Yet, the Dolphins are at 1 - 3 to start the season.
snippet: Nick Saban is thought of as one of the N.F.L.’s brightest coaches, a defensive mastermind and a strong talent evaluator. Yet, the Dolphins are at 1 - 3 to start the season.
